main.body_pretext: Open-Source tools to easily build and maintain your event-driven architecture. All powered by the AsyncAPI specification, the
main.slogan_text: Proud to be part of the

features.title: Why AsyncAPI?
features.description: Improving the current state of Event-Driven Architectures (EDA)
features.specification.name: Specification
features.specification.description: Allows you to define the interfaces of asynchronous APIs and is protocol agnostic.
features.document-apis.name: Document APIs
features.document-apis.description: Use our tools to generate documentation at the build level, on a server, and on a client.
features.code-generation.name: Code Generation
features.code-generation.description: Generate documentation, Code (TypeScript, Java, C#, etc), and more out of your AsyncAPI files.
features.community.name: Community
features.community.description: We're a community of great people who are passionate about AsyncAPI and event-driven architectures.
features.open-governance.name: Open Governance
features.open-governance.description: Our Open-Source project is part of Linux Foundation and works under an Open Governance model.
features.much-more.name: And much more...
features.much-more.description: We have many different tools and welcome you to explore our ideas and propose new ideas to AsyncAPI.

adopters.title: Adopted by the world leading brands
adopters.description: These brands are already using AsyncAPI in production. Is your company using AsyncAPI and wants to be included in this list?

community.title: Join our great community!
community.subtitle: We're a community of great people who are passionate about AsyncAPI and event-driven architectures.
community.slackCTADesc: We welcome everyone to join our Slack workspace. If you have a question on how to use AsyncAPI, want to contribute, or simply want to say hello ðŸ‘‹, you're welcome to join us. We're nice people ðŸ™‚
community.meetingDesc: AsyncAPI hosts different meetings every week. They are focused on different topics, sometimes purely technical and sometimes about community building. Pick one and join us!

sponsors.sponsorCTADesc: These great organizations are already supporting AsyncAPI. Want to become a sponsor?
sponsors.supportedByPretext: The following companies support us by letting us use their products for free. Interested in supporting us too?
